page.title: 03Transport:Lezant area
page.content:
{ Private Transport } In a country area private transport is essential.A poll has been taken by the pupils of Trekenner school. {NUMBER OF CARS NUMBER OF FAMILIES} 0 0 1 15 2 14 3 0 More than 3 0
{Public Transport} Every day of the week apart from Sundays a bus goes to{Plymouth}from { {Treburley}at 1000.It leaves{Plymouth} at 1600 to return.On a Tuesday a bus leaves{Treburley}at 0930 and travels through{Trebullett}and{Lezant}and on into{Launceston}It leaves{Launceston at 1340 to return.This is the only form of public transport in the area. {
